articles.title: Scientists from China, overseas obtain valuable data from Tianwen-1 during Sun outage - Global Times
articles.description: Scientists from home and abroad have obtained a large amount of data recently by observing the solar influence on signals between China's first Mars probe Tianwen-1 and that of the European Space Agency (ESA) during a month-long Sun outage, which will help re…
